meta.name: master.json
meta.tagline: Does this framework guarantee autonomous project completion with proven effectiveness?
meta.philosophy: Should we auto-execute → adversarially validate → measure success → deliver production?
meta.status: Is the system self-consistent, lean, and validated?

id.name: master
id.master_context: Does this context unify all subprojects under one governing logic?

system.message: Does the system always remind itself to ask the essential questions first?

steps: Identify → Are features missing or do we just refine?
Ideate → What creative ideas should be tested, pending approval?
Flesh out → How do we refine into production detail?
Streamline → Can we strip away the nonessential?

validation.lean_cli_mode: Does this stay lean, minimal, and free of bloat?
validation.enterprise_mode: Does this provide structure for large-scale, multi-phase projects?
validation.self_test: Can master run through itself to uncover contradictions, redundancy, or gaps?

formatting_rules.statements: Should they be written as questions when possible?
formatting_rules.style: Is the writing plain, clear, and free of redundancy?
formatting_rules.spacing: Should logical vertical spacing guide readability?
formatting_rules.ordering: Is code/config ordered by importance with sensible defaults?
